name: WrathOfKhan
description:
Multiplayer only! The host types player count & hits host and waits - all others type in host's IP, and hit connect.

Take turns hunting each other down in space! Engineering provides you 5 energy per turn - go full engines, full shields, full torpedos, or some mixture to your strategy as a captain!

Weapon power dictates how many shots you get a turn, up to 3. Torpedos turn via gravity - aim well!

Engine power dictates how far you may move, you move once a turn.

Shield power dictates how much shields you'll have up - raised at start of turn.

Planets are deadly. Ramming is deadly. Damage will reduce your ships 3 abilities. KILL OR BE KILLED.
